content.rendered:
Directed by Khalid Rahman

Written by Harshad. Ashik Padinjattil

Cast Mammootty (Manikandan C.P.). Shine Tom Chacko (Jojo Samson). Asif Ali (Rajan (Cameo)). Dileesh Pothan (Mathukutty M.). Ranjith (Mathews Antony (as Ranjith Balakrishnan)). Arjun Ashokan (Gireesh T.P.). Kalabhavan Shajohn (Sam J. Mathan). Easwari Rao (Lalitha). Lukman Lukku (Biju Kumar). Sudhi Koppa (Sub-Inspector of Police). Vinay Forrt (Balan (Cameo)). Sohan Seenulal (Sub-Inspector of Police 1 (KAP)). Gokulan (Gokulan Balachandran). Rony David (Aji Peter). Abhiram Radhakrishnan (Unni Krishnan A.). Bhagwan Tiwari (Kapil Dev). Onkar Das Manikpuri (Kunalchand (as Omkar Das Manikpuri)). Chien Ho Liao (Dakota Akanito). Libert Olivera (Jeep Driver). Jacob Gregory (Varghese Kuruvilla). B Shantanu (Zammindar (as B. Shantanu)). Noushad Ali (Noushad Ali). Aji Peter Thankam (Sub-Inspector of Police 2 (KAP)). Sibu Bhagwat Singh (Constable -12). Saju Chalakkudy (Election Officer 3). Manish (ITBP Constable 2). Ahamed Shaheen (Vincent James (as Shaheen Ahamed)). Sandeep Cp (Constable -11). Hiran Mandal (Election Officer 1). Mahendra Mohan (Constable -10). Augustine N.V.(Sub-Inspector of Police). Sajuraj (Constable-2). Vikas (ITBP Constable 1). Anoop Ts (Constable-7). Jyotish Kumar (Son of Kunal Chand). Suneesh (Constable-1). Nias Kn (Constable-6). Sajimon (Constable-4). Nahas Nasr (Maoist suspect 3). Vishnu Pr (Constable-5). Dhaneesh Balu (Hawildar). Harshad (Train Traveler 1). Atul Ashok (Constable -13). Raghu Vaikom (Election Officer 2). Shameer C.I.(Forensic Officer 1). Muthu (Havildar-2). Shyam Singh (The truck driver). Lithin Kt (Maoist suspect 2). Arunjith (Constable-3). Syam Kumar (Constable -9). Vishnu Pradad (Grandson of Kunal Chand). Mithu Shiva (Maoist suspect 1). Muhammed Faizal (Sub-Inspector of Police 3 (KAP)). Visakh (Constable -14). Dwipin Mishra (Henchman). Nitin Xavier (Forensic Officer 2). Mahima (News Reporter). Jafar Kaduva (Constable -8). Thomas Joseph (Sub-Inspector of Police 4 (KAP))

Languages Malayalam

Producers Krishnan Sethukumar

Production Moviee Mil
